title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Amy: PART 1
itunes:title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Amy: PART 1
description:
The Best Bits podcast is now officially separated into two podcasts!! This part of the podcast is the version you all have been wanting as a stand-alone, Morgan and a guest having their in-depth conversations without any interruptions. In this podcast you’ll hear Morgan and Amy talk about some things currently happening in their lives. Amy discusses marriage, life with kids, and something she’s really excited about. Morgan shares some things about her relationship, new Food World news, and a crazy thing that happened to her.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
